task.en: Create a blank Pages document and insert a table with 8 rows and 6 columns.
task.zh: 创建一个空白Pages文稿，并插入一个8行6列的表格。
task.ar: أنشئ مستند Pages فارغًا وأدرج جدولًا به 8 صفوف و6 أعمدة.
task.ja: 空白のPages文書を作成し、8行6列の表を挿入してください。
task.ru: Создайте пустой документ Pages и вставьте таблицу из 8 строк и 6 столбцов.

pre_command: osascript -e 'tell application "Pages" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Keynote" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Pages" to activate'
grading_command: osascript -e 'tell application "Pages" to count rows of table 1 of front document' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "8" && osascript -e 'tell application "Pages" to count columns of table 1 of front document' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "6" && echo "True" || echo "False"
osascript -e 'tell application "Pages" to count rows of table 1 of front document' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "8" && echo "True" || echo "False"
osascript -e 'tell application "Pages" to count columns of table 1 of front document' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "6" && echo "True" || echo "False"
